title: GROOVY (2015) PC
description:
============================================
GROOVY (2015) PC
============================================

Languages: ENGLISH

============================================
Description: =
============================================

Arcade, dynamic, hardcore and minimalistic Ã¢â‚¬â€œ it is the Groovy world. 
Is the competition on the speed, agility and reaction. 
Groovy - a robotic ball that is in abstract and crazy world. 
A ball movement limited by its electric charge and the height of the jump presence of vapor traction. 
All of these factors cause the player to create their own strategy and approach for the pass the next level, and it will be very fun! 
The game has three completely different game modes. 
Also, you will encounter a "hyper-levels" in which Groovy from one game mode moves to another within one level! 
The game results are displayed on a specially designed online table.
